attributes.action: Make it compulsory to re-attain a Driver's License after one year; to prevent the over 80s from driving.
attributes.additional_details: A petition in response to the rising number of deaths caused by pensioners driving the wrong way on dual carriageways and motorways. In response to this growing trend, we the undersigned, wish the government to require re-training for drivers every year; and the permanent revocation of the driving license for people aged 80 and over.
